mapper.select: select u.id ,u.nickName,t.type,t.number,ta.operation_sn,t.created_time,t.remark from eb_tank_equipment_number_info t left join eb_user u on u.id = t.store_user_id left join eb_tank_activate ta on ta.id = t.activate_id where 1=1 and t.store_user_id = #{id} order by t.created_time desc
